articles.title: Wolves boss Bruno Lage: Pressure on youngsters is paying off - Express & Star
articles.description: Bruno Lage believes his rant calling out Ki-Jana Hoever has helped Wolves’ young stars ‘wake up’.
articles.content:
The 20-year-old defender struggled in the first 25 minutes of the poor loss to Crystal Palace last month before being forced off with a hamstring injury.
